solution_line_template: First find the total soaking time to get rid of the grass stains: {grass_stain_soak_time_per_stain} minutes/stain * {num_grass_stains} stains = <<{grass_stain_soak_time_per_stain}*{num_grass_stains}={total_grass_stain_soak_time}>>{total_grass_stain_soak_time} minutes

Then add the soak time for the marinara to find the total soak time: {total_grass_stain_soak_time} minutes + {marinara_stain_soak_time} minutes = <<{total_grass_stain_soak_time}+{marinara_stain_soak_time}={total_soak_time}>>{total_soak_time} minutes
